和敬清寂: (わけいせいじゃく) - (yoji) harmony, respect, purity and tranquility; the four most important elements of the tea ceremony
和敬静寂: (わけいせいじゃく) - (yoji) harmony, respect, purity and tranquility; the four most important elements of the tea ceremony
和文: (わぶん) - Japanese text; sentence in Japanese
和文タイプライター: (わぶんタイプライター) - Japanese typewriter; typewriter that can type using Japanese characters
和文体: (わぶんたい) - literary style from the Heian era onwards, often mainly in kana and written by women
和時計: (わどけい) - clocks made in Japan, mainly in the Edo period; clocks that tell Japanese time
和暦: (われき) - Japanese calendar; Japanese imperial year
和書: (わしょ) - book in Japanese; book bound in the Japanese style
和本: (わほん) - book bound in Japanese style
和机: (わづくえ) - Japanese-style desk (short, used while sitting on the floor)
和柄: (わがら) - traditional Japanese pattern; traditional Japanese design
和楽器: (わがっき) - traditional Japanese musical instrument
和歌: (わか) - waka; classic Japanese poem, esp. a tanka, often 31 morae
和歌山県: (わかやまけん) - Wakayama prefecture (Kinki area)
和気あいあい: (わきあいあい) - (yoji) harmonious; peaceful; congenial
和気藹々: (わきあいあい) - (yoji) harmonious; peaceful; congenial
和気藹藹: (わきあいあい) - (yoji) harmonious; peaceful; congenial
和気靄々: (わきあいあい) - (yoji) harmonious; peaceful; congenial
和気靄靄: (わきあいあい) - (yoji) harmonious; peaceful; congenial
和洋中: (わようちゅう) - Japanese, Chinese and Western (e.g. when referring to food styles available, etc.)
和洋折衷: (wayousetchuu) - mistura de estilos japonês e ocidental
和漢混交文: (わかんこんこうぶん) - mixed writing of literary Japanese and Chinese
和漢混淆文: (わかんこんこうぶん) - mixed writing of literary Japanese and Chinese
和漢薬: (わかんやく) - Japanese and Chinese medicine; oriental medicine
和物: (わもの) - Japanese-made thing; Japanese goods; Japanese style thing
和痛分娩: (わつうぶんべん) - delivery with little pain (i.e. use of pain-reducing drugs)
和算: (わさん) - Japanese mathematics; mathematics developed in Japan
和算家: (わさんか) - scholar of Japanese mathematics; expert of Japanese maths
和習: (わしゅう) - touch of Japanese; tinge of Japanese; Japanese flavour (flavor); Japanese style (e.g. of kanbun writing, in contrast to actual Chinese)
和臭: (わしゅう) - touch of Japanese; tinge of Japanese; Japanese flavour (flavor); Japanese style (e.g. of kanbun writing, in contrast to actual Chinese)
和色: (わしょく) - traditional Japanese colours (colors); addition color
和薬: (わやく) - traditional Japanese medicine; Japanese folk medicine
和蘭: (オランダ) - Holland (por: Olanda); The Netherlands
和蘭陀: (オランダ) - Holland (por: Olanda); The Netherlands
和衷協同: (わちゅうきょうどう) - (yoji) harmonious cooperation; close cooperation
和装: (わそう) - dressed in kimono; Japanese clothing
和装本: (わそうぼん) - book bound in Eastern style
和製英語: (わせいえいご) - Japanese word constructed of elements from one or more English terms
和製語: (わせいご) - Japanese word constructed of elements from foreign languages
和親条約: (わしんじょうやく) - treaty of peace and amity; peace treaty
和解: (わげ) - reconciliation/amicable settlement/accommodation/compromise/mediation/rapprochement; (わかい only) {law} court-mediated settlement; translation of a foreign language into Japanese
和解案: (わかいあん) - {law} settlement; compromise settlement; settlement offer
和解離婚: (わかいりこん) - divorce by settlement
和訓: (わくん) - Japanese reading of a Chinese character
和語: (わご) - native Japanese words (especially as opposed to Chinese and other foreign loanwords)
和讃: (わさん) - hymns of praise in Japanese
和讚: (わさん) - hymns of praise in Japanese
和酒: (わしゅ) - traditional Japanese alcohol (primarily sake, but also shochu and fruit wine)
和鋏: (わばさみ) - U-shaped scissors with no place to put one's fingers
和音: (わおん) - {music} chord; (Japanese) on reading; Japanese music
和顔愛語: (わがんあいご) - (yoji) with a gentle face and a nice word
和風: (わふう) - Japanese style; light wind/moderate breeze
和食: (わしょく) - Japanese food; Japanese-style meal; Japanese cuisine
和食処: (わしょくどころ) - Japanese style restaurant; Japanese style dining hall
和食回帰: (わしょくかいき) - (yoji) revival of Japanese food
和食膳: (わしょくぜん) - tray of traditional Japanese food
和魂洋才: (わこんようさい) - (yoji) Japanese spirit with Western learning
